text: Lootospark is a football stadium located in the town of Põlva in Põlva County in Estonia. It is the current home ground of Põlva FC Lootos. ==References== *Info at fclootos.ee *Info at Estonian Football Association *https://www.spordiregister.ee/et/ehitis/994/jalgpallistaadion_lootospark Category:Football venues in Estonia Category:Põlva Parish Category:Buildings and structures in Põlva County
title: Lootospark
